headline: Digital Realty Declares Quarterly Cash Dividend for Common and Preferred Stock
summary: Digital Realty (NYSE: DLR), the largest global provider of cloud- and carrier-neutral data center, colocation and interconnection solutions, announced today its board of directors has authorized quarterly cash dividends for common and preferred stock for the fourth quarter of 2025.

raw.headline: Digital Realty Declares Quarterly Cash Dividend for Common and Preferred Stock
raw.summary: Digital Realty (NYSE: DLR), the largest global provider of cloud- and carrier-neutral data center, colocation and interconnection solutions, announced today its board of directors has authorized quarterly cash dividends for common and preferred stock for the fourth quarter of 2025.

headline: Digital Realty Advances AI Infrastructure Innovation Supporting NVIDIA AI Factory Research Center and NVIDIA DSX Blueprint
summary: Digital Realty (NYSE: DLR), a leading global provider of cloud- and carrier-neutral data center, colocation, and interconnection solutions, today announced a further collaboration with NVIDIA focused on advancing the design and deployment of next-generation AI infrastructure at Digital Realty's campus in Manassas, Northern Virginia.

raw.headline: Digital Realty Advances AI Infrastructure Innovation Supporting NVIDIA AI Factory Research Center and NVIDIA DSX Blueprint

headline: Should You Buy Digital Realty Trust Stock Right Now?
summary: Data center demand is skyrocketing, which bodes well for this prominent data center developer and operator.

headline: How Digital Realty Trust's Upbeat 2025 Outlook May Shape the Investment Case for DLR
summary: Digital Realty Trust, Inc. reported third-quarter 2025 results in October, posting year-over-year growth in revenue and net income while raising its full-year guidance for both revenue and net income per diluted share. This performance was accompanied by an updated forecast, with the company now expecting 2025 revenue of between US$6.03 billion and US$6.08 billion and net income per diluted share between US$3.57 and US$3.62. We'll review how Digital Realty Trust's improved earnings outlook...
